text: Nastanthus is a genus of flowering plants in the family Calyceraceae. It has been proposed to synonymize Nastanthus within the genus Gamocarpha. ==Species== Species include: * Nastanthus falklandicus D.M.Moore * Nastanthus agglomeratus * Nastanthus patagonicus * Nastanthus spathulatus ==References== Category:Calyceraceae Category:Asterales genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Nastanthus
